author_name: Hunter Biden doesn't recall knocking up a stripper
html:
What about stopping crime downtown? Isn't that more important than Selfies on social media? OK, who am I kidding - Tecklenburg is a clown ü§°ü§°ü§°for a mayor.

— Hunter Biden doesn't recall knocking up a stripper (@BidenLegs) August 17, 2021

Missed #CityHallSelfie yesterday, but I‚Äôm making up for it by using my mug from McMinnville (@TheBaconDiaries) from the last @ELGL50 mug exchange. And I‚Äôm drinking local coffee that my sister brought up from Atlanta. Both are solid choices for GA coffee connoisseur @DrZeemering pic.twitter.com/orS58AnI6a

— Alex Henderson (@Henderson_AC) August 14, 2021

Still #CityHallSelfie Day in #Anchorage #Alaska. Saying hi to @MollyOfDenali at @ANCParksandRec Town square park for @ANCdowntown movie night. @ANCInnovation #iteams @benmatheson @ELGL50 @CityHallSelfie pic.twitter.com/SQYyWDt0rF
